citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
***A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:10am to
11:40am on 05/17/2016. Attempts to make contact with the licensee were done by honking the vehicle horn,
waiting in the driveway for 30 minutes, calling the licensee's phone numbers and leaving a voicemail.
Additional Inspectors
Osborne Stephanie, Animal Care Inspector
